013package org.apache.juneau.utils;
014
015/**
016 * A simple weighted average of numbers.
017 *
018 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
019 * </ul>
020 */
021public class WeightedAverage {
022   private Double value = 0d;
023   private int weight;
024
025   /**
026    * Add a number with a weight to this average.
027    *
028    * @param w The weight of the new value.
029    * @param v The new value.
030    * @return This object.
031    */
032   public WeightedAverage add(int w, Number v) {
033      if (v != null) {
034         try {
035            double w1 = weight, w2 = w;
036            weight = Math.addExact(weight, w);
037            if (weight != 0) {
038               value = (value * (w1/weight)) + (v.floatValue() * (w2/weight));
039            }
040         } catch (ArithmeticException ae) {
041            throw new ArithmeticException("Weight overflow.");
042         }
043      }
044      return this;
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Returns the weighted average of all numbers.
049    *
050    * @return The weighted average of all numbers.
051    */
052   public double getValue() {
053      return value;
054   }
055}
